name: Stranded With You
description:
✧

A world ravaged by an unknown disaster. 

As nature reclaims the remnants of a once grand civilization, you play as a wanderer that scavenges all they can find, only to one day stumble upon a strange creature in the ruins of a temple.

Now you must attempt to reunite this strange creature with its kind and learn to use the abilities that it has granted you.


✧

Movement .................................................... WASD
Telekinesis / Long-range interaction .... Left Mouse
 Short-range interaction .......................... Left Mouse (just need to be close)

Authors' Notes

Thank you for checking out Stranded With You.
This was made as a final semester project for a joint course between the Game Art and Game Programming courses at Media Design School. Three artists and three programmers working together over the course of seven weeks in conceptualizing, prototyping and then finally developing it into what we've released here.

This wasn't just an assessment to us though, we also saw it as a passion project inspired by games that we all love and ideas we all wanted to see realised.

The ending is unfortunately missing, but hopefully we'll be able to put it in at some point in the future! A majority of the content is still there, so we hope you enjoy that!
